snippet: A surprising name has been added to the list of N.H.L. free agents: goalie Martin Brodeur, who has spent his 20-year career with the Devils.
abstract: New Jersey Devils goalie Martin Brodeur, who has spent his 20-year career with the Devils, hires an agent, signaling that he will test the free agency market.
lead_paragraph: A surprising name has been added to the list of N.H.L. free agents: goalie Martin Brodeur, who has spent his 20-year career with the Devils.

headline.seo: In the N.H.L., the Free Agent Bazaar Is Now Open for Business
headline.main: A Devil for 20 Years, Brodeur Is Expected to Test the Market
headline.print_headline: A Devil for 20 Years, Brodeur Is Expected To Test the Market
